meanings.definition: A person or thing that rewinds something.
meanings.sent1: The rewinders at the library always make sure the books are in order.
meanings.sent2: I bought a rewinder to help with organizing my yarn.
meanings.sent3: The little robot claimed to be the fastest rewinder in the land.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like a rewinder, playing back moments in perfect detail.
meanings.sent5: The rewinder in the factory hummed as it neatly wound up the cables.

meanings.definition: A device used to rewind tapes or film.
meanings.sent1: The old rewinder in the attic still works like a charm.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a rewinder for my VHS tapes.
meanings.sent3: The rewinder sat quietly in the corner, waiting for its next task.
meanings.sent4: The rewinder spun the film backwards, revealing the scenes in reverse.
meanings.sent5: The rewinder clicked softly as it rewound the cassette tape.

meanings.definition: A function on a remote control that allows for rewinding of recorded content.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to use the rewinder button when watching the movie.
meanings.sent2: The rewinder feature on the remote is very convenient.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally pressed the rewinder and ended up watching the same scene twice.
meanings.sent4: The rewinder on the remote control felt like a time machine, taking me back instantly.
meanings.sent5: With a press of the rewinder, the show rewound to the beginning of the episode.
